description: This file is a React component for the main weather application page, managing state, effects, and rendering various UI components related to weather data, locations, and user interactions.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Updates the selected location based on user search input.

methods.name: handleLocateMe
methods.description: Uses geolocation API to set current position as selected location.

methods.name: handleAddLocation
methods.description: Adds a new location to the list, with optimistic UI update.

methods.name: handleRemoveLocation
methods.description: Removes a location from the list, with rollback on error.
